epics.Summary: Self-Serve AI Tool Provider Launch v1
epics.Description: Launch a self-serve commercial motion for AI tool providers with persistent money rails, usage billing, arbitration ops UI, pricing, and activation flows that drive first paid settlements.

tickets.Summary: Persist money rail operations in Postgres
tickets.Description: Replace process-local adapter state with durable tenant-scoped operation and provider-event persistence for payout and collection rails.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Money rail operations and provider events survive API restart and reconcile identically across repeated reads

tickets.Summary: Wire API to durable money rail adapter
tickets.Description: Use store-backed money rail adapter in API create/status/cancel/ingest flows with deterministic fallback behavior in sandbox.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: All ops money-rail endpoints operate on durable state and existing e2e money-rail tests pass

tickets.Description: Emit billable usage events for verified runs settled volume and arbitration usage with immutable audit fields.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Usage event stream is queryable by tenant and period and matches deterministic replay under repeated inputs

tickets.Description: Aggregate billable events into invoice-ready line items with idempotent period close and reconciliation hooks.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Invoice line-item artifacts are generated deterministically and reconcile to source usage events with zero drift

tickets.Description: Launch public /pricing surface with Free Builder Growth Enterprise tiers and value-event pricing details.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Pricing page renders current plan terms and passes copy review with no contradictions to billing policy docs

tickets.Summary: Enable Stripe self-serve checkout by plan
tickets.Description: Map pricing plans to Stripe products checkout sessions and subscription lifecycle updates.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Tenants can upgrade from free to paid via checkout and billing state updates automatically on webhook confirmation

tickets.Summary: Enforce plan quotas in API gateway
tickets.Description: Apply plan-aware rate and volume caps for verified runs settlement volume and arbitration usage with clear error codes.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Requests above plan limits are blocked with stable quota error responses and quota counters remain consistent under retries

tickets.Summary: Implement overage billing and threshold alerts
tickets.Description: Apply overage calculation above included limits and issue 80 percent and 100 percent threshold notifications.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Overage line items appear in invoice artifacts and alert events fire once per threshold crossing per period

tickets.Description: Provide operator queue for open arbitration cases with filters SLA timers and ownership actions.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Operators can list assign and triage arbitration cases from UI with state changes reflected in API within one refresh interval

tickets.Summary: Add arbitration evidence and ruling workspace
tickets.Description: Implement case detail panel for evidence review ruling draft and verdict submission with audit trace visibility.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Rulings submitted from UI generate valid verdict artifacts linked to dispute evidence and pass verification checks

tickets.Summary: Ship policy preset packs for budgets and disputes
tickets.Description: Provide presets for spend caps holdbacks and dispute windows with one-click apply and rollback.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Admins can apply preset packs and resulting policy hashes are versioned auditable and restorable

tickets.Summary: Expose public verified receipt endpoint and badge
tickets.Description: Publish a public receipt endpoint and embeddable badge proving verification status settlement outcome and receipt hash.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Receipt endpoint returns signed verification summary and badge embed validates against receipt hash with no private data leakage

tickets.Description: Create one canonical quickstart for AI tool providers from signup to first live settlement in under 10 minutes.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: New tenant can complete first live settlement by following documented steps and smoke script passes in CI

tickets.Summary: Ship three reference integrations for tool providers
tickets.Description: Deliver and test three production-like integration templates showing contract proof settlement dispute loops.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Three reference integrations run end-to-end in CI and each emits a verified settlement artifact

tickets.Summary: Launch docs changelog and onboarding email sequence
tickets.Description: Publish launch docs changelog and onboarding email journey tied to activation milestones.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Docs and email sequence are live and triggered by tenant onboarding events without manual intervention

tickets.Summary: Publish benchmark report and referral loop
tickets.Description: Release benchmark report on verification and settlement performance and launch referral loop for self-serve growth.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Benchmark report is published and referral funnel captures invite and conversion metrics end-to-end

tickets.Summary: Stand up MVSV command dashboard and launch gate
tickets.Description: Implement MVSV dashboard with funnel metrics and enforce 30-day launch exit criteria gate for go/no-go.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Dashboard reports MVSV funnel and launch KPIs daily and go/no-go gate auto-evaluates defined thresholds
